title: dev command does not correctly watch glob member patterns

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

body:
### Describe the bug

Running `cargo tauri dev` with this Cargo.toml config:

```toml
[workspace]
resolver = "2"
members = ["bin/iron", "crates/*"]
```

live reloading does not work for anything in `crates/*`. Manually adding one explicit item, such as:

```
members = ["bin/iron", "crates/settings", "crates/*"]
```

makes it work again for that one, leading me to think this is the root cause

### Reproduction

Create a tauri app using a cargo workspace where `workspace.members` uses a glob pattern.
try to edit a file in that glob while developing. live reloading should fail to trigger

### Expected behavior

Live reloading should catch all rust members of the workspace
